about.title: About PinPointd
about.subtitle: PinPoint Your Memories
about.how_it_works_desc: PinPointd allows you to create personalized pins on an interactive world map. Each pin represents a location that matters to you - whether it's a favorite restaurant, a memorable travel spot, or a hidden gem you want to share with friends.
about.how_it_works_desc2: Our platform combines geolocation technology with social networking features, allowing you to connect with friends, discover new places, and build a visual collection of your favorite locations around the world.
about.technology_desc: Built with modern web technologies including React, Firebase, and Leaflet maps, PinPointd offers a seamless experience across all devices. Our platform supports multiple languages and provides real-time updates for an engaging social experience.
about.benefit1: Create and share personalized location pins with friends
about.benefit2: Discover new places through your social network
about.benefit3: Build a visual map of your travels and favorite places
about.benefit4: Connect with friends through shared location interests
about.benefit5: Access your pins from any device with our cross-platform support
about.getting_started_desc: Sign up for a free account to start creating your own pins, connecting with friends, and exploring the world through PinPointd. Our intuitive interface makes it easy to get started in minutes.

our_story.title: What is our beginning?
our_story.paragraph1: PinPointd began as a passion project in early 2024, born from the idea that the places we visit shape our experiences and connections. Our founder, Dumitrescu Darius - Ioan, was traveling abroad and realized there was no easy way to share meaningful locations with friends and family beyond simple check-ins or generic recommendations.
our_story.paragraph2: What started as a simple map-sharing tool quickly evolved into a comprehensive social platform that connects people through their shared love of places. Whether it's a hidden cafe in Paris, a scenic hiking trail in Colorado, or a cozy bookstore in Tokyo, PinPointd helps users discover, share, and discuss locations that matter to them.
our_story.paragraph3: Today, our growing community spans the globe, with users pinning locations across six continents. We're committed to continually improving the platform with new features while maintaining our core values of privacy, authenticity, and meaningful connection.

testimonials.testimonial_2: I love how easy it is to discover new places through my friends' pins. It's like having a global community of travel guides!

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: At PinPointd, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our application.

information_collection.title: Information We Collect
information_collection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, profile information, and location data when you use our application. We also collect information about your device and how you use our application.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our application. Your location data is used to provide location-based features and enhance your experience.

sharing.title: How We Share Your Information
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our application, conducting our business, or serving our users.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our application and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our application is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

rights.title: Your Rights and Choices
rights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also choose to limit the information you share and control your privacy settings within the application.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the effective date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at dumitrescu.darius.ioan@gmail.com
